settings.body_1:
When Cielo Vista Church undertook a complete upgrade of the main auditorium in 2018, church leaders discussed how to have the biggest impact on the stage’s set design and overall room aesthetic and quickly decided that incorporating LED video walls would be a gamechanger. The team started small, using the new IRiS® ICON™ IP3 XL panels as an extension of their set design and stacking them into 5 columns on the stage. As they gained experience, they played around with a variety of content, and reconfigured the panels for different sets.

“Once you have a video wall you can’t go back,” said Alex Ringering, Production Manager at Cielo Vista Church. “It’s a night and day difference on stage and once the congregation sees it, it’s a whole other ball game.
settings.form_text: Sign up for more IRiS® case studies.
settings.body_2: “We underestimated just how versatile the video wall would be,” said Alex. “We bought them as set pieces and once we started exploring, we realized there are so many possibilities from a design perspective. They’re basically virtual set pieces and we’ve saved money and time on set builds since we started incorporating the walls.” IRiS ICON IP3 panels are built with adaptive HDR technology and come in 2 sizes (500x500mm or 500x1000mm) that can be combined in one build. They’re also designed to make setup a breeze thanks to quick-thumb locks and a light design at only 14.5 lbs for the XL.
settings.body_3_title: Full Service: No Fears for 7 Years™
settings.body_3: “The extent of the coverage is phenomenal and provides great peace of mind,” said Alex. “We also broke a panel with a set piece, and I was blown away by how easy the repair was; we just swapped out an LED and we didn’t even have to take anything apart.” Each IRiS panel is QC’d before it is shipped out, and comes with the industry’s only No Fears for 7 Years™ limited warranty, to make sure the show always goes on.

settings.title: IRiS® ICON™ IP3 XL
settings.subtitle: Professional Indoor/Outdoor LED Video Panels
settings.copy:
• Built around NovaStar™A8s receiving cards, ICON panels offer HDR10 & HLG support, automatic module calibration, and image rotation; along with an advanced 3-in-1 SMD LED configuration.

• Outdoor-rated IP3 & IP3 XL panels can handle any application under the sun – or clouds – while hitting the road in their ATA-spec roto-molded cases, which feature self-aligning magnetic casters.

• Quick-thumb locks make any setup a breeze, along with blackout gaskets, retractable corner protectors & ground support locks – all designed in panels as light as 6.6 kg (14.5 lbs).

• Backed by the industry’s only No Fears for 7 Years™ warranty

settings.challenge: Cielo Vista Church undertook a complete upgrade of its main auditorium in 2018 and decided that an LED video wall would be a gamechanger for their set designs and the overall room aesthetic.
settings.solution: Sight and Sound Technologies put together a complete package that featured IRiS® ICON™ IP3 XL panels and NovaStar ™ VX1000 all-in-one controllers.
settings.result: IRiS video panels have transformed the congregation’s experience. The team can get creative and do more than they previously thought possible, and they even added to their video collection in 2023.
